title: Altar space

properties.name: description
properties.value: Altar space is a hotspot in the Chapel and Achievement Gallery of a player-owned house that is only visible to the player when in building mode.

SMW Subobject for ChapelImage: File:Altar space (Chapel).pngObject ID: 15270Uses infobox: SceneryIs members only: trueIs variant of: Altar space

Altar space is a hotspot in the Chapel and Achievement Gallery of a player-owned house that is only visible to the player when in building mode.

Contents

  • 1 Chapel
    • 1.1 Uses
    • 1.2 Creation Menu
  • 2 Achievement Gallery
    • 2.1 Uses
    • 2.2 Creation Menu

Chapel[edit | edit source]

Uses[edit | edit source]

Altars can be used to recharge Prayer points, and provide a place to sacrifice bones for greater Prayer experience than burying them.

Item XP multiplier with # of burners lit
0 1 2
Oak altar 100% 150% 200%
Teak altar 110% 160% 210%
Cloth altar 125% 175% 225%
Mahogany altar 150% 200% 250%
Limestone altar 175% 225% 275%
Marble altar 200% 250% 300%
Gilded altar 250% 300% 350%

Creation Menu[edit | edit source]

Key[c 1] Level Altar Materials Experience Cost
1 45 Oak altar Oak plank x4 240 1,732
2 50 Teak altar Teak plank x4 360 3,288
3 56 Cloth altar Teak plank x4
Bolt of cloth x2 		390 5,406
4 60 Mahogany altar Mahogany plank x4
Bolt of cloth x2 		590 10,550
5 64 Limestone altar Mahogany plank x6
Bolt of cloth x2
Limestone brick x2 		910 15,106
6 70 Marble altar Marble block x2
Bolt of cloth x2 		1,030 668,820
7 75 Gilded altar Marble block x2
Bolt of cloth x2
Gold leaf x4 		2,230 1,210,660
  1. ^ Press this key on your keyboard while in the Creation Menu to build this item.

Achievement Gallery[edit | edit source]

Uses[edit | edit source]

Item Use[1]
Ancient altar Allows the player to swap between the Ancient Magick and Standard spellbooks.
Lunar altar Allows the player to swap between the Lunar and Standard spellbooks.
Dark altar Allows the player to swap between the Arceuus and Standard spellbooks.
Occult altar Allows the player to swap between all spellbooks.
  1. ^ Using the altar to swap to the spellbook requires the requisite quest to be completed.

Creation Menu[edit | edit source]

Key[1] Level Altar Materials Experience Cost
1 80 Ancient altar Limestone brick x10
Magic stone
Ancient signet
Pharaoh's sceptre 		1,490 5,023,689

Magic stone
Lunar signet
Astral rune x10,000 		1,957 2,204,421

Magic stone
Arceuus signet
Blood rune x5,000
Soul rune x5,000 		3,888 3,814,419
4 90 Occult altar Limestone brick x10
Magic stone
All secondary items (signets, runes, sceptre)[2] 		3,445 9,053,691
  1. ^ Press this key on your keyboard while in the Creation Menu to build this item.
  2. ^ If an altar is built already, the magic stone, limestone brick, and current secondary items are not needed anymore. The remaining items needed are those from the two missing altars not built.
